name: Paneer Tikka
recipe: Soft paneer cubes marinated in a seasoned masala and cooked in a tandoor. Serves 1-2.

name: Masala Dosa
recipe: This aromatic dish features a thin dosa made from fermented rice and lentil batter.Served with coconut chutney, red ginger chutney and sambhar.

name: Gulab Jamun
recipe: Soft delicious berry sized balls made of milk solids, flour & a leavening agent.

name: Tandoori Momos
recipe: Veg-filled dumplings cooked in a tandoor oven with a spicy masala seasoning, offering a flavorful and aromatic vegetarian snack option.

name: Paneer Salad
recipe: Grilled paneer with boiled exotic veggies ,broccoli,beans,carrot,cucumber,tomato,corn

name: Dal Tadka
recipe: A flavorful, comforting Indian delicacy with a perfect balance of aromatics and rich, earthy flavors.
